content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 15, "index": 19}, {"type": "andesite_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 41}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 42}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 10, "index": 43}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft stripped_oak_wood. Stripped_oak_wood requires placing 4 stripped_oak_log side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move one of the stripped_oak_log from slot 41 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 15, "index": 19}, {"type": "andesite_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 41}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 42}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 10, "index": 43}]

thought: Since one stripped_oak_log has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another stripped_oak_log to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the stripped_oak_log to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 15, "index": 19}, {"type": "andesite_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 42}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 10, "index": 43}]

thought: Since two stripped_oak_log have been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another stripped_oak_log below them. Slot 4 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the stripped_oak_log to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 15, "index": 19}, {"type": "andesite_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 42}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 10, "index": 43}]

thought: Since three stripped_oak_log have been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another stripped_oak_log to the right of the bottom row. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, and therefore I will move the stripped_oak_log to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 15, "index": 19}, {"type": "andesite_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 42}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 10, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the stripped_oak_wood by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
